original: Archaeological excavations in Shabran and Baylagan have uncovered ceramic artifacts that indicate a sophisticated development of visual arts in the Middle Ages. Azerbaijani rugs, originating from Azerbaijan—an ancient center of carpet weaving—reflect this rich artistic heritage. Historically, Azerbaijan has been recognized for its diverse range of crafts, with archaeological evidence revealing advanced practices in agriculture, livestoc
